context.p: To install Eucalyptus on servers running RHEL 5:

step.cmd: Enable the Cluster-Storage repository in Red Hat Network for each planned SC:

substep.cmd: Navigate to the system that will run the SC.
Click the Alter Channel Subscriptions link.
Ensure that the RHEL Cluster-Storage checkbox is checked.

step.cmd: Enable the Virtualization repository in Red Hat Network for each planned NC:

substep.cmd: Navigate to the system that will run the NC.
Click the Alter Channel Subscriptions link.
Ensure that the RHEL Virtualization checkbox is checked.
